name: StarCraft
description:
StarCraft is an action game developed by Mass Media. It came out on 31-03-1998. Blizzard Entertainment published the game. StarCraft has a Metascore of 88, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
StarCraft is available on Nintendo 64, PC and macOS.
It was scored by Derek Duke, Glenn Stafford, Jason Hayes and Tracy W. Bush.
